author: Richard Galant, CNN
title: Donald Trump's supreme challenge
description: In the absence of a powerful government, human life is "solitary, poor, nasty, brutish, and short," wrote British philosopher Thomas Hobbes 369 years ago. That dire picture seemed especially apt this week.
content:
Sign up to get our new weekly column as a newsletter. We're looking back at the strongest, smartest opinion takes of the week from CNN and other outlets.
